And the guy who put in on the phone - you are not watching 1080p video. You phone doesn't support 1080p. It will be downscaled to fit to your screen. You would be better off downloading a better fitting version, because a video encoder will give a better image than your phone scaling it.

I think YIFY and the other uploaders of this movie haven't explained what is going on.
This is a Russian copy that somehow they got so much time before the official dvd release date. There are no russian subs or dub, there is nothing to bother you in this copy. Only the logo of the expendables and the location names that appear on the screen are in Russian nothing else.
I enjoyed the movie, I think there is no reason to wait for an american copy but I think the uploaders should inform us about the above. I didn't use the subtitles file so I don't know about it.
